name: Your Full Name
title: Senior QA Analyst
summary: Results-driven Senior QA Analyst with 8+ years of experience in software quality assurance, test automation, and team leadership. Proven expertise in developing comprehensive test strategies, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring product quality across web and mobile platforms. Strong background in Agile methodologies, API testing, and performance optimization.

responsibilities: Led quality assurance initiatives for enterprise-level applications serving 500K+ users
Developed and maintained automated test suites using Selenium and Cypress, reducing regression testing time by 60%
Implemented API testing framework with REST Assured, achieving 95% code coverage
Mentored team of 4 junior QA engineers in automation best practices and testing methodologies
Collaborated with development teams to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins
Performed load and performance testing using JMeter, identifying critical bottlenecks
Designed and executed comprehensive test plans for web and mobile applications
Created automated test scripts using Selenium WebDriver and Java
Conducted functional, regression, and integration testing across multiple platforms
Participated in Agile ceremonies and collaborated with cross-functional teams
Documented and tracked defects using JIRA, ensuring timely resolution

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
